remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.HostingPrintServer%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> object must be spelled "HostingPrintServer", not "PrintServer" or "Hostingprintserver".
